name: Why do we fall?
description:
Tips to play: 

Level 1: you need to pickup the coin and wait until your health is very low to level up against boss

Level 1 boss: level up at the beginning to restore your health. decrease the rope speed until your health is low again. then swing at higher speed to pickup the potion when you health is low again

------

There are rumors of missing heroes! It is up to you to get into the magical well and find and rescue the heroes deep down.

The game takes a different approach on tower defence genre 

  • Control your rope - swinging speed and direction
  • Save more heroes to form a line and change your heroes' positions
  • Level up you heroes to stand against evil
